item.title: Hexo to Hugo
item.description: I’ve moved from Hexo to Hugo because of the following three reasons: I’m the kind of person who likes to try out new things; Hugo is Go based; I’m a fan of the author, spf13, because of the vim config script - spf13-vim. The basic setup procedures are almost the same. Hexo: brew install node npm install -g hexo-cli hexo init blog cd blog npm install hexo new post xxxx.
